name: Neo-Tokyo
description: A sprawling cyberpunk metropolis, rebuilt after the Great Collapse. Known for its advanced technology and underground fighting circuits.

name: Lunar Colony Alpha
description: Humanity's first permanent settlement on the Moon, a hub for zero-gravity sports and corporate intrigue.

name: The Martian Dust-Bowl
description: A rugged, red wasteland now home to daring prospectors and extreme sports enthusiasts. Gravity is significantly lower.

name: Atlantis Reborn
description: A fully submerged city beneath the Atlantic, a marvel of bio-engineering and marine architecture. Known for its serene yet powerful atmosphere.
